definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: I have several friends whose spouses I’ve never met.
sentences.chinese: 有些朋友的配偶我素未謀面。
我明天將來誥日和他謀面。

sentences.english: And then you knew that the girl you met in the street was your long-lost classmate.
sentences.chinese: 你終於意識到，那天碰到的是一位久未謀面的老同學。

sentences.english: I went back to old familiar places, saw friends and family that it has been too long since our last meetings.
sentences.chinese: 我回到那些熟悉的故地，看到久違謀面的家人朋友。

sentences.english: You can form personal relationships with people you would have never met otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 你可以與素未謀面的建立個人關係。

sentences.english: A long time ago, the only things we interacted with that we couldn’t see were ghosts and gods.
sentences.chinese: 曾經，我們能夠交流的卻素未謀面的只有鬼魂和上帝。

sentences.english: Well, I have a blind date for tonight with a girl named April May.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我和一個叫埃普洛梅的未曾謀面的女孩初次約會。

sentences.english: How could he have stolen from a rival he had never met?
sentences.chinese: 他怎樣從一個素未謀面的競爭者手中竊取了機密？

sentences.english: God eight flew away, even if we've never met.
sentences.chinese: 神八飛走了，即使我們素未謀面。
